description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Build something abstract, build something cute or build something awesome - whatever your mood is. This game offers a truly open-ended experience where the limits are only your imagination and ..360 building blocks. The game also comes with a challenge mode, 3 levels of difficulty and in-game awards. Train your perception and memory building against time randomly generated 3D structures.
